references.description: The SNOMED code represents Not fasting (situation)
The SNOMED code represents Before meal (qualifier value)
The SNOMED code represents After meal (qualifier value)
The NCIT code represents Before breakfast
The NCIT code represents After breakfast
The NCIT code represents Before lunch
The NCIT code represents After lunch
The NCIT code represents Before dinner
The NCIT code represents After supper or evening meal
This value is currently not part of any standard vocabulary, but is needed to describe for ex. 2-hour postprandial blood glucose

description: The temporal relationship of a clinical measure or assessment to meals.
